1
128 85 3 5

--- Replacing range of bits ---
00010000000 00001010101 00010010100

00001010101
00101010100 (<<2)

00000000001 
00000000011 (<<1 + 1)
00000000111 (<<1 + 1)
00000001111 (<<1 + 1)
00000011111 (<<1 + 1)

00101010100
00000011111 (&)
00000010100

00010000000
11111100011 (&)
00010000000

--- To get 1111111100011 ---

0000000000000
1111111111111 (~)
1111111111000 (<<(5-3+1))
0000000000111 (~)
0000000011100 (<<2)
1111111100011 (~)

00000010100
